events.name: North Korea's Missile Test and Its Implications
events.wd_label: North Korea's Missile Test and Its Implications
events.wd_description: North Korea conducted its largest-ever missile test, launching the Hwasong-17 intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) which demonstrates its nuclear capabilities and poses a significant challenge to the US and its allies.
events.description: North Korea conducted its largest-ever missile test, launching the Hwasong-17 intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) which demonstrates its nuclear capabilities and poses a significant challenge to the US and its allies.

events.name: Missile Test
events.wd_description: North Korea launched the Hwasong-17 ICBM, the largest liquid-fuelled missile ever launched from a road-mobile launcher, capable of reaching targets 15,000 kilometers away.
events.description: North Korea launched the Hwasong-17 ICBM, the largest liquid-fuelled missile ever launched from a road-mobile launcher, capable of reaching targets 15,000 kilometers away.

events.name: t: Missile Launch Details
events.wd_description: The missile flew higher and longer than any previous North Korean tests before crashing into the sea west of Japan.
events.description: The missile flew higher and longer than any previous North Korean tests before crashing into the sea west of Japan.

events.name: t: Kim Jong Un's Statement
events.wd_description: Kim Jong Un stated that the test was a demonstration of North Korea's nuclear capabilities to deter US military actions and due to escalating military tensions.
events.description: Kim Jong Un stated that the test was a demonstration of North Korea's nuclear capabilities to deter US military actions and due to escalating military tensions.

events.name: t: Missile Specifications
events.wd_description: Analysts noted that the Hwasong-17 is the largest liquid-fuelled missile launched from a road-mobile launcher and could reach the entire US mainland with a warhead weighing less than a tonne.
events.description: Analysts noted that the Hwasong-17 is the largest liquid-fuelled missile launched from a road-mobile launcher and could reach the entire US mainland with a warhead weighing less than a tonne.

events.name: Implications for the US and Allies
events.wd_label: Implications for the US and Allies
events.wd_description: The missile test poses a direct challenge to the US amidst the Russia-Ukraine conflict and raises the prospect of a new crisis with the election of a conservative administration in South Korea.
events.description: The missile test poses a direct challenge to the US amidst the Russia-Ukraine conflict and raises the prospect of a new crisis with the election of a conservative administration in South Korea.

events.name: t: US Response
events.wd_description: The US condemned the missile test, with US Secretary of Defence discussing response measures with counterparts in South Korea and Japan, and announced sanctions on entities supporting North Korea's missile program.
events.description: The US condemned the missile test, with US Secretary of Defence discussing response measures with counterparts in South Korea and Japan, and announced sanctions on entities supporting North Korea's missile program.

events.name: t: South Korea's Reaction
events.wd_description: South Korea's President-elect Yoon Suk-yeol condemned the test and responded with live-fire drills of its own missiles, indicating a revival of tensions.
events.description: South Korea's President-elect Yoon Suk-yeol condemned the test and responded with live-fire drills of its own missiles, indicating a revival of tensions.

events.name: t: Potential Crisis
events.wd_description: The missile test raises the prospect of a new crisis with the election of a conservative administration in South Korea, which has pledged a stronger military strategy against Pyongyang.
events.description: The missile test raises the prospect of a new crisis with the election of a conservative administration in South Korea, which has pledged a stronger military strategy against Pyongyang.

events.name: International Reactions
events.wd_description: The missile test drew condemnation from international leaders, including the US and Japan, and prompted discussions on strengthening defense cooperation among allies.
events.description: The missile test drew condemnation from international leaders, including the US and Japan, and prompted discussions on strengthening defense cooperation among allies.

events.name: t: Condemnation from Leaders
events.wd_description: Leaders from the US and Japan condemned North Korea's missile test.
events.description: Leaders from the US and Japan condemned North Korea's missile test.

events.name: t: Defense Cooperation
events.wd_description: US Secretary of Defence held discussions with South Korea and Japan to strengthen defense cooperation in response to North Korean missile activities.
events.description: US Secretary of Defence held discussions with South Korea and Japan to strengthen defense cooperation in response to North Korean missile activities.

events.name: North Korea missile tests
events.wd_description: Beginning on January 5, North Korea initiated a new round of missile tests over the Sea of Japan, aiming to circumvent American and Japanese missile defense technologies.
events.description: Beginning on January 5, North Korea initiated a new round of missile tests over the Sea of Japan, aiming to circumvent American and Japanese missile defense technologies.

events.name: missile tests
events.wd_description: North Korea began missile tests over the Sea of Japan on January 5.
events.description: North Korea began missile tests over the Sea of Japan on January 5.

events.name: defense circumvention
events.wd_description: The missile tests are targeted toward circumventing American and Japanese missile defense technologies in the region.
events.description: The missile tests are targeted toward circumventing American and Japanese missile defense technologies in the region.

events.name: diplomatic preemption
events.wd_description: Some analysts suspect the missile tests are intended to preempt a new push for diplomatic engagement with the U.S.
events.description: Some analysts suspect the missile tests are intended to preempt a new push for diplomatic engagement with the U.S.

events.name: sanctions
events.wd_description: The U.S. has leveraged severe sanctions against North Korea due to its missile programs.
events.description: The U.S. has leveraged severe sanctions against North Korea due to its missile programs.

events.name: Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcanic eruption and tsunamis, January 2022
events.wd_label: Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcanic eruption and tsunamis, January 2022
events.wd_description: The Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcano in Tonga erupted, causing widespread ash fallout and tsunamis across the Pacific, leading to confirmed casualties and significant disruption to telecommunications in Tonga.
events.description: The Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcano in Tonga erupted, causing widespread ash fallout and tsunamis across the Pacific, leading to confirmed casualties and significant disruption to telecommunications in Tonga.

events.name: Volcanic eruption in Tonga
events.wd_description: The Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcano erupted for twelve hours, blasting ash into the atmosphere and causing significant disruption to the region.
events.description: The Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcano erupted for twelve hours, blasting ash into the atmosphere and causing significant disruption to the region.

events.name: Tsunami impact across the Pacific
events.wd_description: The eruption triggered tsunamis that reached as far as Peru and the United States, causing damage across the Pacific region.
events.description: The eruption triggered tsunamis that reached as far as Peru and the United States, causing damage across the Pacific region.

events.name: Telecommunications and casualty impact
events.wd_description: The eruption damaged telecommunications cables in Tonga, leaving the full extent of the damage unknown, with confirmed casualties in Tonga and Peru.
events.description: The eruption damaged telecommunications cables in Tonga, leaving the full extent of the damage unknown, with confirmed casualties in Tonga and Peru.

events.name: Development of a Canadian Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Development of a Canadian Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada is working to establish a domestic battery supply chain through a "mines to mobility" approach, leveraging its reserves of critical minerals and strong trade agreements with the US and EU, but faces several challenges including minimal manufacturing capacity and slow decision-making processes.
events.description: Canada is working to establish a domestic battery supply chain through a "mines to mobility" approach, leveraging its reserves of critical minerals and strong trade agreements with the US and EU, but faces several challenges including minimal manufacturing capacity and slow decision-making processes.

events.name: Push for Domestic Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada is focusing on building a domestic battery supply chain to reduce reliance on Asian producers and to secure critical minerals for EV and grid-scale battery applications.
events.description: Canada is focusing on building a domestic battery supply chain to reduce reliance on Asian producers and to secure critical minerals for EV and grid-scale battery applications.

events.name: t: Critical Mineral Reserves
events.wd_description: Canada has reserves of cobalt, graphite, lithium, nickel, copper, and manganese, essential for advanced battery production.
events.description: Canada has reserves of cobalt, graphite, lithium, nickel, copper, and manganese, essential for advanced battery production.

events.name: t: Trade Agreements
events.wd_description: Canada has the infrastructure and trade agreements needed to access the US and EU markets, two of the largest EV markets.
events.description: Canada has the infrastructure and trade agreements needed to access the US and EU markets, two of the largest EV markets.

events.name: t: Skilled Workforce and R&D Ecosystem
events.wd_label: t: Skilled Workforce and R&D Ecosystem
events.wd_description: Canada has a skilled workforce and a cutting-edge battery research and development ecosystem.
events.description: Canada has a skilled workforce and a cutting-edge battery research and development ecosystem.

events.name: Challenges in Establishing Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada faces several challenges in developing a mature battery supply chain, including minimal manufacturing capacity, slow decision-making, small market size, and competition with China.
events.description: Canada faces several challenges in developing a mature battery supply chain, including minimal manufacturing capacity, slow decision-making, small market size, and competition with China.

events.name: t: Manufacturing and Processing Capacity
events.wd_description: Canada has minimal manufacturing capacity and lacks the processing capacity for battery-grade materials.
events.description: Canada has minimal manufacturing capacity and lacks the processing capacity for battery-grade materials.

events.name: t: Decision-Making and Administrative Processes
events.wd_description: Canada is slow in decision-making, causing long lead times for administrative processes, permitting, and funding allocations.
events.description: Canada is slow in decision-making, causing long lead times for administrative processes, permitting, and funding allocations.

events.name: t: Market Size and Investment
events.wd_description: Canada’s small market size makes it difficult to scale up domestic battery supply chains and establish major manufacturing facilities.
events.description: Canada’s small market size makes it difficult to scale up domestic battery supply chains and establish major manufacturing facilities.

events.name: t: Technology and Supply Chain Uncertainty
events.wd_label: t: Technology and Supply Chain Uncertainty
events.wd_description: The rapidly changing nature of battery technology and uncertainty around investment flows and new players entering the market pose challenges for supply chain development.
events.description: The rapidly changing nature of battery technology and uncertainty around investment flows and new players entering the market pose challenges for supply chain development.

events.name: Priority Actions for Development
events.wd_description: Canada has identified priority actions to establish itself in the global battery industry, focusing on funding, cooperation with the US, promoting a clean and responsible battery brand, and forming task forces.
events.description: Canada has identified priority actions to establish itself in the global battery industry, focusing on funding, cooperation with the US, promoting a clean and responsible battery brand, and forming task forces.

events.name: t: Funding and Cooperation
events.wd_description: Canada plans to focus funding and cooperate with the US to develop its battery supply chain.
events.description: Canada plans to focus funding and cooperate with the US to develop its battery supply chain.

events.name: t: Clean Battery Brand Promotion
events.wd_description: Canada aims to promote a clean and responsible battery brand to attract investment and market interest.
events.description: Canada aims to promote a clean and responsible battery brand to attract investment and market interest.

events.name: t: Formation of Task Forces
events.wd_description: Task forces from the government and enterprises will be formed to drive the development of the battery supply chain.
events.description: Task forces from the government and enterprises will be formed to drive the development of the battery supply chain.

events.name: Development of Next-Generation Battery Technologies in Western Canada
events.wd_label: Development of Next-Generation Battery Technologies in Western Canada
events.wd_description: Western Canada is focusing on developing next-generation battery technologies, such as all-solid-state batteries, which offer greater energy densities, faster charging, and safer operation than current lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Western Canada is focusing on developing next-generation battery technologies, such as all-solid-state batteries, which offer greater energy densities, faster charging, and safer operation than current lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Western Canada Battery Consortium
events.wd_description: Founded by Dr. Venkataraman Thangadurai, the Western Canada Battery Consortium (WCBC) brings together battery experts and industrial partners to advance battery technology and supply chain development.
events.description: Founded by Dr. Venkataraman Thangadurai, the Western Canada Battery Consortium (WCBC) brings together battery experts and industrial partners to advance battery technology and supply chain development.

events.name: Battery Innovation Hub
events.wd_description: The Battery Innovation Hub (BIH) will provide facilities and expertise to evaluate, certify, and qualify battery development, focusing on next-generation solid-state batteries.
events.description: The Battery Innovation Hub (BIH) will provide facilities and expertise to evaluate, certify, and qualify battery development, focusing on next-generation solid-state batteries.

events.name: t: Research and Development Facilities
events.wd_description: The BIH will include facilities for raw material extraction, refinement, processing, advanced electrode preparation, cell assembly, testing, and safety assessments.
events.description: The BIH will include facilities for raw material extraction, refinement, processing, advanced electrode preparation, cell assembly, testing, and safety assessments.

events.name: t: Industry Collaboration
events.wd_description: The BIH aims to collaborate with battery researchers and industry partners to foster innovation and create intellectual property for commercialization.
events.description: The BIH aims to collaborate with battery researchers and industry partners to foster innovation and create intellectual property for commercialization.

events.name: Research and Development Initiatives
events.wd_description: The WCBC and BIH will focus on developing safe, high-energy-density solid-state batteries using locally available lithium and sulphur resources, and on training researchers in Canada.
events.description: The WCBC and BIH will focus on developing safe, high-energy-density solid-state batteries using locally available lithium and sulphur resources, and on training researchers in Canada.

events.name: t: Solid-State Battery Development
events.wd_description: The consortium plans to develop solid-state batteries with about five times the energy density of current lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: The consortium plans to develop solid-state batteries with about five times the energy density of current lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: t: Researcher Training
events.wd_description: Initiatives will focus on training and employing researchers to support the development and commercialization of advanced battery technologies in Canada.
events.description: Initiatives will focus on training and employing researchers to support the development and commercialization of advanced battery technologies in Canada.
